mapper.sql: t.zdbwid zdbwid, t.zddwid zddwid, t.zdbwlx zdbwlx, t.zdbwmc zdbwmc, t.zdbwwz zdbwwz, t.wxxfx wxxfx, t.zysx zysx, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t2.uuid uuid, t2.zdbwid zdbwid, t2.syxz syxz, t2.jzjg jzjg, t2.qymj qymj, t2.gnms gnms, t2.delete_flag deleteFlag, t2.datasource datasource, t2.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t2.reserve1 reserve1, t2.reserve2 reserve2, t2.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t2.uuid uuid, t2.zdbwid zdbwid, t2.jzjg jzjg, t2.zdmj zdmj, t2.zzgd zzgd, t2.zzzc zzzc, t2.jsfzr jsfzr, t2.jsfzrdh jsfzrdh, t2.ylxx ylxx, t2.cwxx cwxx, t2.gylc gylc, t2.delete_flag deleteFlag, t2.datasource datasource, t2.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t2.reserve1 reserve1, t2.reserve2 reserve2, t2.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t2.uuid uuid, t2.zdbwid zdbwid, to_char(t2.zrj,'fm9999999990.00') zrj, t2.cgsl cgsl, to_char(t2.cgjg,'fm9999999990.00') cgjg, t2.ccjzms ccjzms, t2.jsfzr jsfzr, t2.jsfzrdh jsfzrdh, t2.plqkd plqkd, t2.plqkn plqkn, t2.plqkx plqkx, t2.plqkb plqkb, t2.delete_flag deleteFlag, t2.datasource datasource, t2.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t2.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t2.reserve1 reserve1, t2.reserve2 reserve2, t2.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t2.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t1.uuid uuid, t1.bwid bwid, t1.jzmc jzmc, t1.jzsjcl jzsjcl, t1.jzlhtx jzlhtx, t1.jzbz jzbz, t1.delete_flag deleteFlag, t1.datasource datasource, t1.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t1.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t1.reserve1 reserve1, t1.reserve2 reserve2, t1.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t1.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4

t1.uuid uuid, t1.sjlx sjlx, t1.pkid pkid, t1.cgmc cgmc, t1.cglx cglx, t1.cgrl cgrl, t1.cgzj cgzj, t1.cggd cggd, t1.cgzc cgzc, t1.gdmj gdmj, t1.gzyl gzyl, t1.ccwd ccwd, t1.ccjzmc ccjzmc, t1.ccjzlhxz ccjzlhxz, t1.ccjzsjcl ccjzsjcl, t1.ccjzywgd ccjzywgd, t1.bz bz, t1.delete_flag deleteFlag, t1.datasource datasource, t1.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t1.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t1.reserve1 reserve1, t1.reserve2 reserve2, t1.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t1.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_ZDBW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name zdbwlxmc FROM YAGL_ZDBW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDBWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zdbwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name zdbwlxmc FROM YAGL_ZDBW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDBWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zdbwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.ZDBWID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS zdbwid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_ZDBW(zdbwid,zddwid,zdbwlx,zdbwmc,zdbwwz,wxxfx,zysx,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{wxxfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zysx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_ZDBW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.ZDBWID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_ZDBW(zdbwid,zddwid,zdbwlx,zdbwmc,zdbwwz,wxxfx,zysx,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwid,#{item.zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zddwid,#{item.zdbwlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwlx,#{item.zdbwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwmc,#{item.zdbwwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwwz,#{item.wxxfx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} wxxfx,#{item.zysx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zysx,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE zdbwid = VALUES(zdbwid), zddwid = VALUES(zddwid), zdbwlx = VALUES(zdbwlx), zdbwmc = VALUES(zdbwmc), zdbwwz = VALUES(zdbwwz), wxxfx = VALUES(wxxfx), zysx = VALUES(zysx), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT , c2.code_name zdbwlxmc FROM YAGL_ZDBW t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDBWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zdbwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.code_name zdbwlxmc, , c4.code_name jzjgmc, c6.code_name syxzmc FROM YAGL_ZDBW t LEFT JOIN YAGL_ZDBW_JZL t2 ON(t.ZDBWID=t2.ZDBWID AND t2.DELETE_FLAG='N')
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZDBWLX' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.zdbwlx = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'JZJG' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.jzjg = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'JZSYXZ' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c6.CODEID = c5.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t2.syxz = c6.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.ZDBWLX = '10' AND t.ZDDWID = #{value}
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
